SEARCH
Module HMS
Package user

Class User

java.lang.Object
user.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public abstract class User extends Object
Represents a User in the hospital management system. A User can be assigned various roles based on their credentials.
Since:
19/11/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Chen Jie

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String hospitalID)
      Creates a new User with the given hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The unique ID assigned to the User.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public abstract void displayMenu()
      Displays the menu for the User. This method must be implemented by subclasses.

    • getHospitalID

      public String getHospitalID()
      Gets the hospital ID of the User.
      Returns:
      The hospital ID of the User.

    • getRoleUsingID

      public static String getRoleUsingID(String hospitalID)
      Gets the role name using the hospital ID prefix.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID to extract the role from.
      Returns:
      The role name (e.g., "Pharmacist", "Patient").

    • login

      public static User login(UserCredentials currentUser)
      Handles the login process for a User, validating and updating credentials if required.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The UserCredentials object containing the User's details.
      Returns:
      A User object after successful login.
